item.description:
From The McGill's:

Packing has commenced as we prepare to move to Portsmouth NH. We will officially be at our new place,Saturday, September 19th. 2009!

So anyone who would like to come and help unpack the truck, you will be rewarded with our eternal gratitude, hot homemade chili with all the fixings and your choice of craft beer (IPA and English Ale) we will have two kegs, soft drinks, bottled water. We are a family of five and could use the help as well as getting to relax and hang out with some great free staters after the unloading. The details: 10am Saturday morning, 40 Dennet Street Portsmouth, NH.

Thanks for your help,
Raymond and Dawn
item.name: FSP Move In Help for the McGills
